mainText: I'm sorry to hear about Steve; as it will be said many times over, he truly changed the world and he will forever be missed.  Steve, through Apple, revolutionized the way we do everything, from making a call, to chatting with family and friends, to telling the story of people all over the world through video and music. He made the computer personal in ways that words cannot describe and for that we shall forever be grateful.
author: Jorge
